name: Avoid insecure parameters for SCrypt password encoder
associatedValueName: Call stack from source down to the target method
description: Using CAST data-flow engine, this metric detects the use of a SCrypt password encoder with insecure parameters.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: Using insecure parameters for this encoder could expose users to brute-force and other types of attacks.
reference:
CWE-916: Use of Password Hash With Insufficient Computational Effort
https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/916.html

CWE-522: Insufficiently Protected Credentials
https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/522.html
alternativeName: Ensure you don't use insecure parameters for SCrypt password encoder
